verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> for the sons קֹ֑רַח <WH7141> of Korah עַֽל־ <WH5921> upon עֲלָמ֥וֹת <WH5961> upon Alamoth שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> A Song אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> God לָ֭נוּ מַחֲסֶ֣ה <WH4268> [is] our refuge וָעֹ֑ז <WH5797> and strength עֶזְרָ֥ה <WH5833> help בְ֝צָר֗וֹת <WH6869> in trouble נִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> present מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> a very

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> after that לֹא־ <WH3808> we will not נִ֭ירָא <WH3372> Therefore will not we fear בְּהָמִ֣יר <WH4171> be removed אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> though the earth וּבְמ֥וֹט <WH4131> be carried הָ֝רִ֗ים <WH2022> and though the mountains בְּלֵ֣ב <WH3820> into the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <WH3220> of the sea

יֶהֱמ֣וּ <WH1993> thereof roar יֶחְמְר֣וּ <WH2560> [and] be troubled מֵימָ֑יו <WH4325> [Though] the waters יִֽרְעֲשֽׁוּ־ <WH7493> shake הָרִ֖ים <WH2022> [though] the mountains בְּגַאֲוָת֣וֹ <WH1346> with the swelling סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> thereof Selah

נָהָ֗ר <WH5104> [There is] a river פְּלָגָ֗יו <WH6388> the streams יְשַׂמְּח֥וּ <WH8055> whereof shall make glad עִיר־ <WH5892> the city אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> of God קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ <WH6918> the holy מִשְׁכְּנֵ֥י <WH4908> [place] of the tabernacles עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> of the most High

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> God בְּ֭קִרְבָּהּ <WH7130> [is] in the midst בַּל־ <WH1077> lest תִּמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> of her she shall not be moved יַעְזְרֶ֥הָ <WH5826> shall help אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God לִפְנ֥וֹת <WH6437> her [and that] right בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> early

הָמ֣וּ <WH1993> raged ג֭וֹיִם <WH1471> The heathen מָ֣טוּ <WH4131> were moved מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <WH4467> the kingdoms נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> he uttered בְּ֝קוֹל֗וֹ <WH6963> his voice תָּמ֥וּג <WH4127> melted אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the earth

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָא֣וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> with מִשְׂגָּֽב־ <WH4869> [is] our refuge לָ֝נוּ אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> [is] with us the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

לְֽכוּ־ <WH1980> Come חֲ֭זוּ <WH2372> behold מִפְעֲל֣וֹת <WH4659> the works יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Who שָׂ֖ם <WH7760> he hath made שַׁמּ֣וֹת <WH8047> what desolations בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the earth

מַשְׁבִּ֥ית <WH7673> to cease מִלְחָמוֹת֮ <WH4421> He maketh wars עַד־ <WH5704> against קְצֵ֪ה <WH7097> unto the end הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the earth קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> the bow יְ֭שַׁבֵּר <WH7665> he breaketh וְקִצֵּ֣ץ <WH7112> in sunder חֲנִ֑ית <WH2595> the spear עֲ֝גָל֗וֹת <WH5699> the chariot יִשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> he burneth בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> in the fire

הַרְפּ֣וּ <WH7503> Be still וּ֭דְעוּ <WH3045> and know כִּי־ <WH3588> that אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> I am אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> that I [am] God אָר֥וּם <WH7311> I will be exalted בַּ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> among the heathen אָר֥וּם <WH7311> I will be exalted בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the earth

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָא֣וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> with מִשְׂגָּֽב־ <WH4869> [is] our refuge לָ֝נוּ אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> [is] with us the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
